subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] This is my second post

full_text:

Welcome Wes 
   
  Sending positive thoughts your way...........
   
  kay
  

Wes Kellington <kq4ok@...> wrote:
      Hi, my name is Wes Kellington, and I am from Waynesboro, VA.  This is my second post since joining the group
  on March 1.
   
  I came here specifically to listen and learn from Frank Sumption and to likeminded individuals.  I am a ham radio operator,
  although I have not been active in years since the CB'ers kind of took over with their new no-code rules, and am a 
  computer technician.  I have been passionately pursuing paranormal interests since I was a child.  So, Frank, please
  keep on supplying us with your knowledge and foresight.  I look forward to your posts; and I read all of them.
   
  I read all the posts, even by the guy with the gall to ask for someone to send him a radio.  Yes, I would give anything
  to have one; but I would not dare ask someone to do that for me.  That's just wrong!  And as far as threatening
  personal emails, what the Hell has been the matter with people?  My wife is the business manager of a local 
  psychiatric practice.  The day of the full moon, they had more patients and admitted more people to the psychiatric
  wing of the hospital than ever!
   
  This is off-topic.  I have been dealing with a personal problem for the past several weeks.  I had a chest X-ray; and
  on it they found a 2.5 cm nodule in one of my lungs.  My catscan is May 8th to make sure I do not have lung cancer.
  The waiting is killing me.  It's like being on death row and waiting to see if the phone rings.  So, I have not had the
  energy to do anything lately.  I am only waiting...
   
  Hopefully, there will be a positive outcome, and then I can delve into this further and begin some research of my own.
   
  Frank, please stick around.
   
  Wes
 

       
---------------------------------
Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile.  Try it now.
